entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of the characters in the story who is yelling at Harry. He is mentioned as 'they' and 'he' in the text.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is another character in the story who is responding to Ron's yell. He is described as being cold, numb, hungry, and thirsty.

entities.name: dragon
entities.description: The dragon is a large creature that Harry and Ron are riding on. It is mentioned as having eaten last for some time and needing sustenance soon.

relationships.description: Harry is riding on the back of the dragon, which is described as 'gliding out of sight beneath them'.
Ron is also riding on the back of the dragon.
